definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
spiral pattern/whorl of fingerprint/thread of screw

sentences.english: These include oysters, clams, mussels and whelks.
sentences.chinese: 这些海产包括牡蛎，文蛤，贻贝和蛾螺。
阿拉斯加蟹爪，冻虾，翡翠螺。

sentences.english: The infested rate of snail and density of potive snail will also rise.
sentences.chinese: 滩地钉螺感染率及感染螺密度也将有所上升。

sentences.english: Any of various marine gastropods, such as a periwinkle, having a spiral shell.
sentences.chinese: 任一种海栖软体动物，如滨螺，长有螺旋形的壳。

sentences.english: Prawns, Scallop, Green Mussels, crab leg, Jade snail.
sentences.chinese: 虾，带子，青口贝，雪蟹腿，翡翠螺。

sentences.english: Golden cowrie shells are among the hardest shells to find and are prized by collectors.
sentences.chinese: 黄金宝螺的贝壳极难找到，它们为收藏家所推崇。

sentences.english: This restaurant serves freshly boiled winkles.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐馆有鲜煮玉黍螺。

sentences.english: Objective To study the activity of water extract of Nerium indicum Mill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究夹竹桃水提物的灭螺活性。

sentences.english: The ability of amoebocytes from snails of both localities to phagocytose sheep red blood cells was confirmed in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 两地螺的阿米巴细胞均具有体外吞噬羊红细胞的能力。

sentences.english: Other spiroplasmas have been isolated and cultured on cell-free media.
sentences.chinese: 其它螺原体已被分离出来，并在无细胞的培养上培养。

sentences.english: In this paper, the growth characteristics of Babylonia areolata in outdoor tank-culture was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对室外水泥池养殖方斑东风螺的生长特性进行了研究。

sentences.english: These snails do not occur on low-lying coral islands or atolls.
sentences.chinese: 在地势低平的珊瑚岛或环礁上没有这种螺。

sentences.english: This paper reported experiments on the artificial propagation of Babylonia.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了方斑东风螺人工育苗试验。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a novel suspension concentrate of niclosamide (SCN) and evaluate its characteristics and molluscicidal effect against Oncomelania snails.
sentences.chinese: 目的研制氯硝柳胺悬浮剂，测定其性能及杀螺效果。

sentences.english: The owl limpet (Lottia gigantean) which clings to rocks in the ocean intertidal zone has a "right-handed" body organization.
sentences.chinese: 是一种右旋的生活在海洋潮间带岩石上的螺。

sentences.english: The thermosensitive element is a spiral coil 12 which is wound from a shape memory alloy wire.
sentences.chinese: 热敏元件为一个用形状记忆合金丝绕成的螺线圈12。

definition: abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
variant of 鯊魚|鲨鱼[sha1 yu2]
